name: LotzofHomeAdvicewithMarkLotz
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Dedicating most of my life to home improvement across the Chicagoland area, I have come to love giving homeowners advice on how to enjoy their homes more. Nobody wants a run-down home or one that drains them of their money. I will bring you daily advice on ways to improve your property to bring you the best return-on-investment, and things you can do to enjoy your home even more than you do now.
